pages.text: $(li)Shears are a sharpness item that can be used to multiple things.$(br)$(li)You can right click a Sheep while you are holding Shears in your hand to obtain its Wool.

$(li)You can right click a Mooshroom while you are holding Shears in your hand to transform it into a Cow.$(br)$(li)You can right click a Pumpkin while you are holding Shears in your hand to turns it into a Carved Pumpkin.$(br)$(li)You can right click the Pumpkin head of a Snow Golem while you are holding Shears to reveal its true face.
$(li)You can right click a Beehive or Bee Nest full of honey to obtain Honeycombs.$(br)$(li)Finally, you can use Shears to harvest tree leaves.
